text: Oh, she was due! And then he added in the same casual tone, "She's not returning to her family. She's going to live with friends of the bank manager, just this side of Belleray." Mrs. Deane made a suitable comment, but Beryl said nothing. She was trying to sort things out in her mind. That beneath his unnaturally smooth exterior Piers was simmering with anger against her she had no doubt.
